1bf8b442-5e3c-44c3-b3ad-d68cab0e90cb.name: 战斗反射
1bf8b442-5e3c-44c3-b3ad-d68cab0e90cb.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

ffcde076-3f55-4b40-941c-a4ac6aefbbc5.name: 幸运
ffcde076-3f55-4b40-941c-a4ac6aefbbc5.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

e4cf5f64-722b-44af-aaa7-88af19ee3a54.name: 易于命中
e4cf5f64-722b-44af-aaa7-88af19ee3a54.notes: 其他人可以将你的双眼作为攻击目标仅受到 -6 命中减值

72b5861e-f487-4c99-8d7a-61017e085613.name: 标志性装备
72b5861e-f487-4c99-8d7a-61017e085613.notes: Gear is worth (starting wealth)/10 per level

892eaed6-a6db-4e09-bb68-e1861906a03d.name: or 1 point for another secondary skill.

ab0eb741-64dc-404c-bf97-887b8b76db31.name: or 1 point to raise one of those skills or main sword skill by a level.

7d5918ac-08fb-4181-b43b-9d8541637473.name: and 2 points to raise one of these skills by a level
